October 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Greetings Justians! Welcome to the latest edition of The Justia Insider. It's time to get ready for some eerie Halloween delights as autumn unfolds with its crisp, chilly embrace. With the year-end festivities on the horizon, don't miss the chance to join in the celebrations of the Justia Ghoulie Awards and the spine-tingling prizes waiting for you all. Wishing you all a fantastic month ahead!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Short Videos (Legal Content). We produced and uploaded two new short videos about Wrongful Termination and Wills (Mexican Law) to our Justia YouTube Channel.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • 50-State Surveys. We worked on surveys on sex offender registration rules for the Criminal Law Center and consumer protection laws for the Consumer Protection Law Center.
  • Justia Legal Dictionary. We continued testing prompts for generating AI definitions of legal terms from various sources.
  • Justia Mexico Portal:
    • We included new pages for the Criminal Law Center on the Justia Mexico Portal. These pages cover topics on Medical Malpractice, Fraud, Human Trafficking, Abuse of Trust, and Interception of Private Communications. Each topic includes an Overview and a FAQ section and each section contains cross links to other Justia Mexico Portal content and external links to relevant laws, codes, and government sites.
    • Our team has updated the Commercial Code, one of the most searched laws on our portal.
    • We updated topics on the Alimony and National Registry of Alimony Obligations centers.
    • The content on our portal has been cited as a source of consultation by the media and the Mexican Congress.

Justia Pet News

Elvis Presley

Elvis, the king of the house, is a 10-year-old Schnauzer who lives with Isma. He enjoys barking at every person or pet that walks down the street. His favorite meals include grilled chicken and dehydrated chicken feet. Elvis also takes pleasure in napping during the afternoons.

— Ismael Muñoz

DID YOU KNOW?

Just Meet Up! September’s Session

On September 13th, we hosted an excellent "Just Meet Up!" session focusing on the exciting world of AI in Graphic Design. We were delighted to welcome enthusiastic students from our local universities. It was a fantastic gathering filled with joyful discussions on various related topics!

Upcoming Events

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Antonio González, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Genaro Osoria, Haydee Garcia, Jorge Contreras, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Omar Carreon, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
